mapper.select: select l.liq_id,l.nm,l.prc,l.cate,l.capct,l.lv,l.irdnt,l.ards,l.img, n.intro,n.pair, c.nm co_name,c.addr,c.hmpg,c.telno, num.avg_rate,num.inqr_num,num.likes_num,num.revw_num from liq l, liq_cn n, liq_co c,liq_nums num where l.liq_id=n.liq_id and l.liq_co_id=c.liq_co_id and l.liq_id=num.liq_id and l.liq_id =#{liqId}

select/*+index_desc(l liq_pk) index_desc(c liq_co_pk)*/ l.liq_id, c.liq_co_id, l.nm, l.prc,l.cate,l.capct,l.lv, l.irdnt,l.img, c.nm co_name, num.avg_rate,num.inqr_num,num.revw_num from liq l,liq_co c,liq_nums num where l.liq_co_id=c.liq_co_id and l.liq_id=num.liq_id and l.liq_id>0
select count(*) from liq l,liq_co c where l.liq_co_id=c.liq_co_id and l.liq_id>0

select/*+index_desc(l liq_pk) index_desc(c liq_co_pk)*/ l.liq_id, c.liq_co_id, l.nm, l.prc,l.cate,l.capct,l.lv, l.irdnt,l.img, c.nm co_name, num.avg_rate,num.inqr_num,num.revw_num from liq l,liq_co c,liq_nums num where l.liq_co_id=c.liq_co_id and l.cate = #{kind} and l.liq_id=num.liq_id and l.liq_id>0
select count(*) from liq l,liq_co c where l.liq_co_id=c.liq_co_id and l.liq_id=num.liq_id and l.cate = #{kind} and l.liq_id>0
mapper.update: update liq_nums set avg_rate =(select trunc(avg(rate),4) from liq_revw where liq_id =#{liqId}) where liq_id=#{liqId}
